title: Download is SO SLOW
body: I just downloaded LoL, and it's taking way too long to load everything up. All I want to do is do the flipping tutorial already. Does anybody know how to fix this??

replies.body:
Were you waiting for the initial download, or are you already installed/patched and just trying to launch the tutorial? 

The main download process can take awhile depending on your internet speeds, and you can get that going a bit faster by updating your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) or using an ethernet instead of wifi.

If the tutorial itself is taking awhile to load, that could be caused by a number of different things like background process or just general lag. I'd start by turning on close client during game in the client options and see how that helps.
The problem is not with our internet. The problem is your shitty servers. https://i.imgur.com/1iLWUn1.png It always has been.
